#summary MacSim-DRAMSim2

[http://www.ece.umd.edu/dramsim/ DRAMSim2] has been integrated with MacSim for more detailed DRAM simulation. Please note that we have to tune other parameters (as of 3/27/2012).


= How to use DRAMSim2 with MacSim =

 # Execute following command
{{{
./dramsim2.sh
}}}

This will automatically check out the latest copy of DRAMSim2 and apply patches to necessary files.

= How to build MacSim-DRAMSim2 =

== scons ==

{{{
./build.py --dramsim
}}}
